actions.name: New
actions.description: Create a new file in Byword.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: If not specified, defaults to the location being browsed. If there is none, Byword will ask the location. One of the following:

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the folder being browsed. If there is none, the root folder of the location is used.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename of the file to create, with extension. If a filename already exists a new one is created. If not specified an untitled file is created.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to insert into the new file.

actions.name: Open
actions.description: Open an existing file. Fails if the file does not exist.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: If not specified, defaults to the location being browsed. If there is none, Byword will ask the location. One of the following:

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the folder being browsed. If there is none, the root folder of the location is used.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename of the file to open, with extension.

actions.name: Append
actions.description: Append content to an existing file. If the file does not exist a new one is created.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: If not specified, defaults to the location being browsed. If there is none, Byword will ask the location. One of the following:

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the folder being browsed. If there is none, the root folder of the location is used.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The filename of the file to open, with extension. If the file doesn’t exist it will be created.
